original_text: Behold, my servant shall deal prudently, he shall be exalted and extolled, and be very high.
korean_text: 보라 내 종이 형통하리니 받들어 높이 들려서 지극히 존귀하게 되리라

sentences.original_text: Behold, my servant shall deal prudently
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 나의 종이 신중하게 행할 것이다

sentences.original_text: he shall be exalted and extolled
